item.title: ## Meeting Notes - Production and Development Tasks
item.description: Meeting Notes - Production and Development Tasks 2025-06-02 Actions: ‚òëÔ∏è Remove (oauth_provider_id, oauth_sub) idx (in favor of optics[?]) ‚òëÔ∏è Deploy to staging following ‚òëÔ∏è Test in staging ‚òëÔ∏è Deploy to production Kiwi: ‚òëÔ∏è “Tap to copy” should probably be pressable ‚òëÔ∏è Add zip share button (location share) ‚òëÔ∏è Level up pre-entry ‚òëÔ∏è Update app icon Right Side Box: Cashapp offer What do we do if we can’t get fluent to raise caps.
item.content:
Meeting Notes - Production and Development Tasks

2025-06-02

Actions:

  • ‚òëÔ∏è Remove (oauth_provider_id, oauth_sub) idx (in favor of optics[?])

Kiwi:

  • ‚òëÔ∏è “Tap to copy” should probably be pressable
  • ‚òëÔ∏è Add zip share button (location share)
  • ‚òëÔ∏è Level up pre-entry
  • ‚òëÔ∏è Update app icon

Right Side Box:

  • Cashapp offer
  • What do we do if we can’t get fluent to raise caps.
  • $600k gross profit
  • $100k playful [unclear: shar] after base pay
  • Applatin internally - Ad creation
    • $60k
    • Cool hire a

Bottom Section:

PP Tax

Right Side Box:

  • Intelligence AI
  • Rosterbook ‚Üí ATD ‚Üí Obsidian

item.title: ## Appuser Effect System Design Notes
item.description: Appuser Effect System Design Notes Appuser Effect Structure Appuser Effect / \ Appuser Effect Key Components: Appusers: Jobs :: Accruve - series Records (Appuser Effect) Appusers: AppuserSpecial offers :: {Claim, process} both offer examples of AppuserEffect creation AppuserEffects: Jobs :: Complex more appuserEffects in Complex Player: Appusors :: Advice :: CeaseReward shows usage of AppuserEffect + Effect so Cease bonus Rewards Effect should be RewardableSub Burn Sources ‚òê Fluent ‚òê Protege offers ‚òê Protege Magic Receipts ‚òê Protege Surveys ‚òê Ravil ‚òê HostGrid /Bestios ‚òê Knucer Process Flow Diagram POST Request Flow:
item.content:
Appuser Effect System Design Notes

Appuser Effect Structure

Appuser Effect
/ \
Appuser Effect

Key Components:

  • Appusers: Jobs :: Accruve - series Records (Appuser Effect)
  • Appusers: AppuserSpecial offers :: {Claim, process} both offer examples of AppuserEffect creation
  • AppuserEffects: Jobs :: Complex more appuserEffects in Complex
  • Player: Appusors :: Advice :: CeaseReward shows usage of AppuserEffect + Effect so Cease bonus Rewards
    • Effect should be RewardableSub

Burn Sources

  • ‚òê Fluent
  • ‚òê Protege offers
  • ‚òê Protege Magic Receipts
  • ‚òê Protege Surveys
  • ‚òê Ravil
  • ‚òê HostGrid /Bestios
  • ‚òê Knucer

Process Flow Diagram

POST Request Flow:

POST ‚Üí Find or Create ‚Üí Find or Create
(send code) Idle 24-hour Appuser Archive
Effect Effect
\ /
- - - - - - -

Event Processing:

Receive Born Source ‚Üí Appusers::AppuserEffects:: Apply Born Modifiers
Event (Reward, appuser)
|
BOOSTED
|
Add another
use Reward
Record

Diagrams Present

  1. Hierarchical Structure Diagram: Shows the relationship between Appuser Effect, Appuser, and Effect components
  2. Process Flow Diagram: Illustrates the POST request workflow with find/create operations and a 24-hour effect duration
  3. Event Processing Flow: Shows how born source events trigger appuser effects and boost rewards

item.title: ## App Development & Monitoring System Design
item.description: App Development & Monitoring System Design Architecture Flow Computer/Server ‚Üí Property ‚Üí [Display/LED Strip] ‚Üì 5v External Power Alloz Integration Alloz ?!?!?! Alloz Speed Run 10 X 12 [dimensions noted] Erebus (LED Strip Simulator?) Features: Device handwriting üì± ‚Üí upload tags Intervals: “daily” / “hourly” Package_name = "" App Components AppPlayTime ScheduleWorkers AppPlayTimeTrackingWorker Scheduled Worker (run every hour) Configuration: Pull tracking worker scheduling config (if config interval changed) CancelUnique WorkName (“PR AppPlaytime Tracker”) + enqueue MagicWork System Architecture Diagram [Diagram shows interconnected boxes representing:]
item.content:
App Development & Monitoring System Design

Architecture Flow

Computer/Server ‚Üí Property ‚Üí [Display/LED Strip]
‚Üì
5v External Power

Alloz Integration

  • Alloz Speed Run
  • 10 X 12 [dimensions noted]

Erebus (LED Strip Simulator?)

Features:

  • Device handwriting
  • üì± ‚Üí upload tags

Intervals:

  • “daily” / “hourly”
  • Package_name = ""

App Components

AppPlayTime ScheduleWorkers

  • AppPlayTimeTrackingWorker

Scheduled Worker (run every hour)

Configuration:

  • Pull tracking worker scheduling config
  • (if config interval changed)
  • CancelUnique WorkName (“PR AppPlaytime Tracker”) + enqueue MagicWork

System Architecture Diagram

[Diagram shows interconnected boxes representing:]

  • Erebus (Amplitude Events v2, 3, 4)
  • Corn Rate w/ Ham Justice
  • PR Remote (getIsSeens)
  • Stored Prefs (interval, package_name) ‚Üí get package_name & interval
  • If interval changed ‚Üí Tracking Worker
  • CancelUniqueWork & enqueueUniqueWork

AppPlaytimeTrackingWorker

  • Every üïê minutes (run @ interval (2sarly))
  • ‚Üë (Daily query for: This every 8-1 day)

Implementation Notes

  • Hmm… Feeling good
  • Queries for 6 progression
    • If daily ‚Üí has it been 1+ hour?
    • If daily ‚Üí has it been 1+ day?

Task List

‚òê Take CFL then spread it out

Dimensions & Specifications

  • Multiple references to “10 X 12” dimensions
  • Device appears to be some form of LED display or monitoring system

Diagram Description: The image contains multiple interconnected flowcharts and system diagrams showing the architecture of an app monitoring system. The main flow shows data moving from a computer/server through various processing stages to display components. There are several boxed sections showing different workers and processes, with arrows indicating data flow and dependencies between components.

item.title: ## Release Notes and System Updates
item.description: Release Notes and System Updates Call Notes: Tuned Global Apps to see? Search/Rec APIs Existing: Many object search (Rec contextual to store) Upcoming: [Diagram: Box containing “Wilson Scoring System” with arrow pointing down to “Elastic Scoring System”] Adobe shutting us off (traffic ‚Üó) Update package from Mega [Diagram: Box containing “Universal Music Group in Tuned Catalogue - Music in Demo”] AppLovin Rewarded Videos Ad Pre-tagging Tuned Global for Cold Start [Diagram: Parallelogram shape containing “Playful Rewards (Userwise) Playful Rhythm”]
item.content:
Release Notes and System Updates

Call Notes:

  • Tuned Global
  • Apps to see?
  • Search/Rec APIs
    • Existing: Many object search (Rec contextual to store)
    • Upcoming:

[Diagram: Box containing “Wilson Scoring System” with arrow pointing down to “Elastic Scoring System”]

  • Adobe shutting us off (traffic ‚Üó)
  • Update package from Mega

[Diagram: Box containing “Universal Music Group in Tuned Catalogue - Music in Demo”]

  • AppLovin Rewarded Videos Ad

Pre-tagging Tuned Global for Cold Start

[Diagram: Parallelogram shape containing “Playful Rewards (Userwise) Playful Rhythm”]

TikTok in Store??? [shown in separate box in upper right]

- 3% margin to user - 97% for us üëÄ

- per hour - all packages - Android only

Dropped Out Issue with guided install

‚òê UX optimizations + segment optimizations ‚òê PR Android app time (Ollur/tracking) ‚òê Rhythm?

Next steps ‚û§ 9+ update? Storage Parsing? Naahh…

RELEASE

UW Updates

L7 Time Tracking ‚§∑ Segment (Easy filtering?) ** Updates** ** ‚§∑ Rhythm**

Diagrams Present:

  1. System Architecture Box: Wilson Scoring System transitioning to Elastic Scoring System
  2. Music Integration Box: Universal Music Group integration with Tuned Catalogue
  3. Rewards System Parallelogram: Showing Playful Rewards and Rhythm features
  4. Revenue Split Box: TikTok integration question with margin breakdown

The notes appear to be from a product development meeting covering system updates, third-party integrations, monetization strategies, and upcoming release plans.

item.title: ## Development Tasks and Planning Notes - May 29, 2025
item.description: Development Tasks and Planning Notes - May 29, 2025 IntelliJ: RedKit Book ‚Üí Tado ‚Üí Obsidian RacketBook ‚Üí Markdown ‚Üí Obsidian General ToDo Remove david@username.io lucky/kiwi G(?)P Auth screen Adobe/Playtime SDK upgrade to 310: Playful Reworks Server ToDo Save new onboarding Kiwi Data Add promo code encoding Add 10% boost functionality Swap Remaining Keys Update Apploin to support Kiwi Add New Kiwi Content Sections Clue Section Horizontal Hotlink Section LevelUp Game Overview Client ToDo Update app-id to be Kiwi Update DoT + Gender to match Tech Update last name audit[?
item.content:

The note shows a typical development sprint planning format with tasks organized by component (General, Server, Client) and includes some completed items that have been crossed out in the IntelliJ section.
